title: Bright & Remodeled 2BR/2BA Cottage w/ Deck, Laundry & Internet!
posting_body: ['***AVAILABLE AUGUST 20TH***', 'IMPORTANT: Once you submit an inquiry, you will be redirected to our scheduling coordinator website, Tenant Turner.', 'On that site, you will be able to select an appointment time to view the space or request to inquire about more details.', 'If you do not see a time that works for you, please scroll to the bottom of the appointment selection and click on “Request a different time”.', 'If there are still no times that work for you, please contact us directly.', 'HIGHLIGHTS & FEATURES:', '• Neighborhood: Pacifica', '• Building: Single Family Home with In-law unit in the back', '• Split: 2BR + 2BA', '• Size: 1,110 sqft', '• Kitchen: Gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher.', '• Outdoor: Front yard and shared backyard with a firepit.', '• Parking: 2 car driveway parking (off street).', '• Storage: None outside of the unit', '• Laundry:', 'In unit', '•', 'Flooring: Hardwood/ tile', '• Grocers: Shop Park Market, Oceana Market, Safeway', '• Parks: Pacifica Espanalde Beach', 'RENTAL DESCRIPTION:', 'Bright and spacious 2BR/2BA is conveniently located in beautiful Pacifica.', 'Invitingly spacious living room for entertaining guests or comfortably enjoying time with family and friends.', 'Large windows throughout the home provide an abundance of natural light showcasing the beautifully finished hardwood floors.', 'The kitchen and dining room flow seamlessly from the living room with an ideal floor plan.', 'The kitchen comes with a contemporary design and feel with white cabinets, wood counter tops and and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher.', 'Spa inspired bathrooms complement the two side by side bedrooms which complete the space.', 'A southern facing front deck and additional shared backyard space with fire pit are perfect places to escape and enjoy the outdoors.', 'PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:', 'Enjoy coastal living at its finest in beautiful and convenient Pacifica.', 'This home is in a quiet area with a small beach town vibe.', 'Listen to the ocean outside your windows and watch the sunset from the front deck.', '1.5 blocks from the beach and a few minutes to grocers, cafes, shops, dining, yoga, Pacifica Pier, hiking and and bike trails.', 'Commuting is a breeze just 15 minutes from San Francisco and quick access to the 280 for travel to the Peninsula and Silicon Valley.', 'Public transit is easily accessible with service to both Bart and Caltrain.', 'LEASE TERMS & REQUIREMENTS:', '• Term = Minimum One Year', '• Pets: None', '• Resident Benefit Package: Required $49.50/month (Includes Renters Insurance, Rewards Program, etc.)', "• Utilities = Tenant's responsibility", '• Security Deposit: Ask about our Deposit Free Options OR standard 2x Monthly Rent', '• Credit Score: Minimum 650', '• Income: Aggregated monthly gross income > 3x Monthly Rent', '• Guarantors Accepted', '•', 'Other:', 'No eviction records, No Felonies, No Bankruptcies', '• Application Fee: $50 per applicant (including rental guarantors or co-signers)', 'ABOUT US:', 'KeyOpp is a Family Owned and Community Focused Property Management Company providing the best experience for both our Residents and our Clients.', 'We have a keen understanding of the importance of balancing and maintaining healthy relationships with our Resident community while also ensuring an effective return for the Real Estate Investment.', 'Learn more about our Leasing, Property Management and Investing services at <URL>', '**', 'Disclaimer: Application fees are non-refundable and submission of an application is not a guarantee of leasing the property.', 'Applications are processed on FIFO and approval is contingent upon minimum qualification requirements and earliest move-in date.', '*']
